name: NOW Inc.
description: NOW Inc. is a leading global provider of supply chain solutions and services for the energy and industrial sectors. Established in 2014 as a spin-off from the distribution segment of National Oilwell Varco, NOW Inc. specializes in the distribution of pipe, valve, and fitting products, as well as providing value-added services to a broad spectrum of customers in the oil and gas, power generation, and other industrial markets. With a focus on operational excellence and customer service, the company operates a vast network of distribution centers and service facilities across North America and internationally, ensuring that customers receive the products they need when they need them. NOW Inc. is committed to delivering high-quality products and services while maintaining a strong emphasis on safety, sustainability, and corporate responsibility. As the energy sector evolves, NOW Inc. is poised to adapt and grow, leveraging technology and innovation to meet the changing needs of its customers and the marketplace. The company's mission is to be the supplier of choice for energy and industrial products, providing unmatched service and support to its clients.
